name: Concept2Company
overview: Concept2Company Ventures (C2C) is a seed venture capital fund which helps faculty and staff within universities and research institusions start companies without quitting their day jobs. C2C looks for opportunities to help founders (professors, researchers, staff, graduate students and undergraduates) who don’t want to leave their present jobs and who usually haven’t started a company before to build a management team, develop a business plan, obtain initial financing and make their ideas and products into successful businesses.
